summary: This document is an email chain from August 10, 2019, discussing updates on Jeffrey Epstein's condition. It begins with an automatic out-of-office reply and includes forwarded messages reporting that Epstein was taken to the hospital after an apparent suicide attempt and later that he had passed away.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email updates; reported to have been taken to the hospital after an apparent suicide attempt and later confirmed to have passed away.

events.title: Epstein Hospitalization and Death
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was taken by ambulance to the hospital after an apparent suicide attempt, and later it was reported that he had passed away.

keyFacts: On August 10, 2019, Jeffrey Epstein was reported to have been taken to the hospital after an apparent suicide attempt.
Later on the same day, it was reported that Epstein had passed away.
The information was communicated via email among individuals, likely including AUSAs (Assistant United States Attorneys) on the case.
The document reflects real-time updates on Epstein's condition on the day of his death.
